requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1050 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: all
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core I7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1060 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: all

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 4+ cores
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics w/OpenGL 4.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

results.name: Identity Crisis (THE GREAT OVERLORD OF ALL CHEESE)
